Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media are fired up about the current state of the Australian economy with some celebrating positive developments like increased recycling and better support for those affected by domestic violence. On the other hand many are angry and frustrated about high costs of living a housing shortage and a concerning immigration plan. However the Labor party is taking action to improve wages and simplify bargaining giving hope for positive change. Meanwhile people are also looking forward to exciting events like #SmartEnergy2023 where panelist Griffith Saul will be speaking.
